key.name: enable-deletion
key.summary: Enable the deletion of clipboard items from your history
key.description: If true, displays 'delete' buttons on each item, and a 'Clear History' option

key.name: refresh-interval
key.summary: The interval between updates in miliseconds
key.description: The interval between updates in miliseconds

key.name: history-size
key.summary: The number of items to save in history

key.name: preview-size
key.summary: Amount of visible characters for clipboard items
key.description: The number of characters to display for every clipbaord item in the history menu

key.name: cache-size
key.summary: The allowed size for the registry cache file.
key.description: If the cache overflows this limit, the file will be overriden. High limit might cause slowness of shell startup.

key.name: prev-item
key.summary: Key to cycle to the previous entry in the clipboard

key.name: next-item
key.summary: Key to cycle to the next entry in the clipboard
